ygData.subject: RE: Hunting Grounds
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Thanks, I ll give that a try! I m sure I ll have some funky lava diving story for the list soon.. hehe ... I started a DE player once just to see Neriak
ygData.messageBody:
> I'm thinking Lavastorm. I've had some fun ther at 16th

Thanks, I'll give that a try! I'm sure I'll have some
funky lava diving story for the list soon.. hehe

> run across Nekulutos forest to get there is exciting
> and cool as well. Have fun, be careful!

I started a DE player once just to see Neriak (BOY am I
glad I did - that has GOT to be the neatest looking
city in the game!) so I'm familiar with Nektulos. I'm
just curious as to how much of a problem the Stone/Iron
guards are going to be. Heh

If you haven't seen Neriak yet, DO IT.
